author: "Joseph Stachelek"
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
output: rmarkdown::html_vignette
vignette: >
  %\VignetteIndexEntry{Screape the NES archival pdf}
  %\VignetteEngine{knitr::rmarkdown}
  %\VignetteEncoding{UTF-8}
---

```{r }
library(nesR)
nes_file <- system.file("extdata/national-eutrophication-survey_1975.PDF", 
                        package = "nesR")

pages <- c(11:77, 79:91, 93:107, 109:139: 141:157, 159:160, 162:170)

lapply(c(11:12), function(x) nes_get(nes_file, x))

```
